message.raw:
BLACS now converts incoming paths to local ones via the shared_drive module, and similarly converts outgoing paths to lyse to network-agnostic ones.

Fixed bugs in Camera ZMQ communication.

Converted paths communicated by the camera tab to network-agnostic ones via the shared_drive module.
